scripts.test: docker build -f Dockerfile-test -t backend-bt-testing . && docker run -it --rm backend-bt-testing
scripts.test:action: docker build -f Dockerfile-test -t backend-bt-testing . && docker run --rm backend-bt-testing
scripts.test:coverage: docker build -f Dockerfile-test -t backend-bt-testing . && docker run -it --rm backend-bt-testing npx vitest --run --coverage
